members.name: MutableFile.name
members.description: The name of the handled file.

members.name: MutableFile.type
members.description: The MIME type of the handled file.

members.name: MutableFile.onabort
members.description: The abort event is triggered each time the handled file is aborted.

members.name: MutableFile.onerror
members.description: The error event is triggered each time something goes wrong.

members.name: MutableFile.open()
members.description: Returns a LockedFile object to read or write the associated file safely.

members.name: MutableFile.getFile()
members.description: Returns a DOMRequest object. In case of success, the request's result is a File object representing a snapshot of the handled file.
